value.title: AI Startup Neureality Raises $35 Mn to Develop AI Inference Chip
value.excerpt: Israeli AI startup Neureality, known for designing AI-as-a-service infrastructure, raises $35 million in Series A funding. The new investment brings their total funding to $48 million.
